mosinstall.author: Matthew Brichacek
mosinstall.description: Component to register as a contact w/ portal privs

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__vtiger_portal_configuration` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `value` text, `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL default 'text', `descr` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__vtiger_registration_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `field` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `name` varchar(255) default NULL, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL default 'text', `show` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `size` varchar(10) default '10', `required` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `order` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=44 ;
